question: “Allahu Lateefun bi I’baadihi Yarzukhoo Mayyashaa’oo wahuwal Khaviyyul A’zeez”What is the meaning of the above?
answer:
QUESTION
I was told to recite this 101 times after Fajr, Inshallah for a better job. Is it OK?
ANSWER


Share:
The meaning of the Aayat quoted is:

?Allah is Gentle on His servants. He provides sustenance for whomsoever He wills, and He is the Omnipotent, the All Mighty.? (Surah Shoora, Verse 19)

It will be permissible to recite this Aayat and you should also recite the following:

?Yaa Lateefu, Yaa Razzaaqu?, a hundred times in the morning and evening and insha-Allah you will get a good job.

And Allah Ta?ala knows best,

Mufti Muhammad Ashraf
Darul Iftaa - Jameah Mahmoodiyah, Springs
